title: [REQUEST] remove output after progress bar has finished.

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
**How would you improve Rich?**

To generate output while running a progress might be a common use case. 
In my case a lot of output might be generate, which I want to get rid of after the progress has finished

The transient = true option only solves this for the progress bar itself.

**What problem does it solved for you?**
What I see at runtime: 
```
Process of ../../htcompact_logs/ukb/2561961_178157.log has been aborted, 
it will be ignored for this summation
Process of ../../htcompact_logs/ukb/4048602_190807.log has been aborted, 
it will be ignored for this summation

it will be ignored for this summation

it will be ignored for this summation

```

What I see afterwards:
```
...
Process of ../../htcompact_logs/ukb/2562001_178159.log has been aborted, 
it will be ignored for this summation
Process of ../../htcompact_logs/ukb/2561974_178158.log has been aborted,

it will be ignored for this summation
+-----------------------------------+
| Job types            | Occurrence |
|----------------------+------------|
| normal executed jobs | 42700      |
| Aborted jobs         | 17         |
+-----------------------------------+
+--------------------------------------+
| Times           | Values             |
|-----------------+--------------------|
| Total runtime   | 2120 days, 8:28:34 |
| Average runtime | 1:11:30            |
+--------------------------------------+
...
```
As you see the progress bar is gone, but the output with the aborted processes is still there \\
What I want:
```
...
+-----------------------------------+
| Job types            | Occurrence |
|----------------------+------------|
| normal executed jobs | 42700      |
| Aborted jobs         | 17         |
+-----------------------------------+
+--------------------------------------+
| Times           | Values             |
|-----------------+--------------------|
| Total runtime   | 2120 days, 8:28:34 |
| Average runtime | 1:11:30            |
+--------------------------------------+
...
```

If this feature already exists, please let me know cause I could not find it.
